job_tasks.phrase: work closely with stakeholders in understanding what the business needs and translate that into technical requirements for research and development.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the need to understand business requirements and translate them into technical specifications.

job_tasks.phrase: Research, prototype and build AI/ML driven systems that understand video and that use the latest innovation.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the development of AI/ML systems, which involves modeling techniques, particularly for understanding video content.
Mentions specific AI technologies (Vector databases, LLMs) that are core to modeling in generative AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Your core role will be to research, prototype and develop software.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the core function of developing software, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: You will work on all aspects of software development including front-end, back-end, database management, and other integrations.
job_tasks.justification: Details various facets of software development, including front-end, back-end, and database management.

job_tasks.phrase: Research, Design, Prototype, Experiment, and build services, tools, systems, features and experiences that help fuel a great streaming experience.
job_tasks.justification: Describes the end-to-end process of creating software services and features.

job_tasks.phrase: Be the spear point of innovation coming up with smart ideas and solutions and rapidly prototyping potential solutions in short iterations.
job_tasks.justification: Emphasizes innovation and rapid prototyping of software solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with other engineers across the company to continuously consider how to implement ideas and prototypes in large-scale applications serving millions of users.
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on implementing prototypes into large-scale applications, a key aspect of software development and integration.

soft_skills.phrase: You dive headfirst into challenges and have a problem-solving mentality.
You are comfortable with failing often and fast on the road towards a solution.
You evangelize software craftsmanship and operational excellence yet pragmatic to know when to incur technical debt versus 'doing it right'.
You are confident yet humble enough to change your mind when new information presents itself.
You value open communication and are willing to give and receive feedback.
You are a self-starter, flexible and can adjust to shifting priorities.
Be the spear point of innovation coming up with smart ideas and solutions

classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes research, prototyping, and development of AI/ML driven systems, specifically mentioning LLMs and vector databases. It requires building and integrating these into large-scale applications, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer focused on user-facing software systems and generative models.
